titles: A proclamacion, ordeyned by the Kynges maiestie, with the aduice of his honorable counsayle for the Byble of the largest and greatest volume, to be had in euery churche Deuised the .VI. day of May the. XXXIII. yeare of the Kynges moste gracious reygne.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1509-1547 : Henry VIII)
publisher: Excussum per Richardum Grafton & Edwardum VVhitchurch. Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Society of Antiquaries.
keywords: Bible --  Publication and distribution --  England --  Early works to 1800.
